flawed_nl_solution:
Andy weighed 156 + 36 = <<156+36=196>>196 pounds after growing taller.
An eighth of his weight is 1/8 x 196 = <<1/8*196=49/2>>49/2 pounds.
Over the next 3 months, Andy lost 49/2 x 3 = <<49/2*3=147/2>>147/2 pounds.
He now weighs 196 - 147/2 = <<196-147/2=245/2>>245/2 pounds.
Andy weighs 156 - 245/2 = <<156-245/2=67/2>>67/2 pounds less than at the beginning of the year.
#### 67/2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 192, not 196. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
